ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch in general(was Changes to Root/Snare)
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree that that this shouldn t impact current TP type issues.  The horse ride thing would have a fixed start and end-point - whereas a TP only has a fixed
ygData.messageBody:
I agree that that this shouldn't impact current TP type issues. The horse
ride thing would have a fixed start and end-point - whereas a TP only has a
fixed end-point (you can launch a TP from any location - the spell only
determines where you end).

The main problem is fitting it into the current engine. It's clear they
won't radically re-engineer the engine (didn't add races or levels to the
Velious expansion). I think a slight modification to your idea - make it a
stagecoach. They could simply take the code for their boats - have a
stagecoach station instead of a dock - and basically make it an overland
boat.

They could make it a flying carpet or some other such graphic as well..

Slyde


-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 1:53 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch in general(was Changes to Root/Snare)


I have given a decent amount of though to the repercussions of the "horse"
idea. I don't think it would affect druid's and wiz's too much. They would
not take the place of boats (which I hate too, but thats another story).
